JobTitle: Sr. Android Engineer - Android Mobile Platform
JobFullDesc: About the Role  As an engineer on the Mobile Foundations & Dev Experience team, you’ll work on the frameworks & tools used by Uber’s large mobile development community. We empower developers to quickly iterate on features and ship reliable & modern mobile apps on a massive scale!   What the Candidate Will Do Develop and maintain foundational frameworks & librariesDevelop and maintain tooling to unlock mobile development at scale          Basic Qualifications At least 2 years of experience working with the Android platformExcellent fundamentals in software engineeringAbility to collaborate and communicate with a globally distributed team to help discover gaps in our frameworks, tooling, and infrastructure and help drive solutions         Preferred QualificationsExperience in mobile platform & developer toolsMentor other engineers and continue building a strong culture of qualityHelp build consensus by being open to a variety of viewpoints and aid in bridging a gap in case of a disagreementStrong written, verbal communication skills; ability to influence others within your team and outside your team
